title: Distribution of gas from Tuesday (31): Litro
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The distribution of domestic gas cylinders is expected to begin next Tuesday (31) or so, said Litro Gas.
Litro Gas stated that the situation has arisen due to a delay in the arrival of the ship carrying gas to Sri Lanka.
The ship is expected to arrive in Sri Lanka at midnight on Sunday (29) or early Monday (30) morning.
In view of these circumstances, the company has advised the public to not to wait in queues to obtain gas cylinders.
Court order prevents protestors from entering several Colombo streets on Saturday (28)
